project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a simple Python-based quiz game that will ask the user multiple-choice questions, keep track of their score, and display the score at the end of the game.

task.name: Implement the quiz questions and answers in the code
Create the logic for asking questions and capturing user responses
Develop the score tracking feature to keep track of correct answers
Implement the final score display feature at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz logic, including question and answer validation
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they function correctly
